title: Identity Agent Template Schema
description: Configuration schema for the ERC-8004 identity-enabled agent template

AGENT_NAME.description: Agent name (set automatically from project directory name)

AGENT_VERSION.description: Semantic version number for the agent

AGENT_DOMAIN.description: Domain that will host the agent (used for ERC-8004 registration)

IDENTITY_INCLUDE_A2A.description: Include A2A service in registration services[]

IDENTITY_INCLUDE_WEB.description: Include web service in registration services[]

IDENTITY_INCLUDE_OASF.description: Include OASF service in registration services[]

IDENTITY_OASF_AUTHORS_JSON.description: JSON array string for OASF authors

IDENTITY_OASF_SKILLS_JSON.description: JSON array string for OASF skills

IDENTITY_OASF_DOMAINS_JSON.description: JSON array string for OASF domains

IDENTITY_OASF_MODULES_JSON.description: JSON array string for OASF module URIs

IDENTITY_OASF_LOCATORS_JSON.description: JSON array string for OASF locator URIs

IDENTITY_INCLUDE_TWITTER.description: Include Twitter service in registration services[]

IDENTITY_TWITTER.description: Twitter handle or URL for service endpoint

IDENTITY_INCLUDE_EMAIL.description: Include email service in registration services[]

PAYMENTS_FACILITATOR_URL.description: x402 facilitator endpoint URL for payment processing

PAYMENTS_FACILITATOR_AUTH.description: Optional bearer token for facilitator requests. If empty, runtime falls back to DREAMS_AUTH_TOKEN when available.

PAYMENTS_RECEIVABLE_ADDRESS.description: Payment address for static destination mode - Ethereum (0x...) or Solana (Base58) format depending on network. Separate from PRIVATE_KEY which is used for EVM identity registration. Can be shared across multiple agents.

STRIPE_SECRET_KEY.description: Stripe secret key used for dynamic destination mode (Base mainnet only)

RPC_URL.description: Blockchain RPC endpoint URL for on-chain operations

IDENTITY_AUTO_REGISTER.description: Auto-register agent on ERC-8004 identity registry at startup

PRIVATE_KEY.description: Wallet private key for signing transactions (required for identity registration)

notes: This template requires a PRIVATE_KEY for on-chain identity registration. Ensure the wallet has sufficient gas for the target network.
